subject: Blacks
Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Nunn parlayed his knowledge of football at historically black colleges into a job with the Pittsburgh Steelers and helped them win four Super Bowls from 1975 to 1980.
snippet: Mr. Nunn parlayed his knowledge of football at historically black colleges into a job with the Pittsburgh Steelers and helped them win four Super Bowls from 1975 to 1980.
